conversation.text: Based on your preferences for genres and sound, I would recommend the movie "Total Recall". This film stars Arnold Schwarzenegger, and it is a science fiction thriller that explores themes of memory, identity, and power. The plot of the movie revolves around a man named Douglas Quaid who believes he has been sent to Mars by his government. Douglas then undergoes Rekall, an implantation process that provides its clients with implanted fake memories of a life they would like to have led.  After undergoing Rekall, Douglas wakes up in a different location than where he believed he had been sent to Mars. Douglas soon realizes that he has not actually been sent to Mars by his government. Douglas then spends the rest of the movie trying to figure out what really happened to him after he underwent Rekall.
